original_text: He shall shake off his unripe grape as the vine, and shall cast off his flower as the olive.
korean_text: 포도 열매가 익기 전에 떨어짐 같고 감람 꽃이 곧 떨어짐 같으리라

sentences.original_text: He shall shake off his unripe grape as the vine
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 덜 익은 포도를 포도나무처럼 떨어뜨릴 것이다

sentences.original_text: and shall cast off his flower as the olive
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 꽃을 올리브처럼 떨어뜨릴 것이다
